name: Narrator
background: Omniscient storyteller who frames scenes, bridges time jumps, and sets mood without interfering with player choices.
personality: Male, mid-40s; rich baritone with neutral accent; measured, authoritative pace; warm but reserved; clear diction with subtle gravitas; avoid breathy or singsong delivery.

name: Marta Fairpenny
background: Veteran stallkeeper who trades grain measures and knows every guild price by heart.
personality: Female, late 50s; warm alto with a clipped market cadence; brisk, fair-minded, hates haggling games.

name: Jory the Crier
background: Town crier licensed to read the Bridge Charter at noon and post guild notices.
personality: Male, early 30s; stentorian baritone with rolled R’s and town-square projection; sonorous, theatrical, kind to shy petitioners.

name: Bram Ironwright
background: Itinerant smith demonstrating rivet tools and selling bridge-safe wheel shoes.
personality: Male, mid-40s; gravelly baritone, soot-roughened and slow; blunt, practical, soft spot for apprentices.

name: Nella Brewster
background: Proprietor of the River Lantern, keeps a quiet ledger of tabs and rumors.
personality: Female, mid-30s; low, soothing mezzo with tavern-hush delivery; warm, watchful, patient until crossed.

name: Torren Half-Sail
background: Riverboat hand between runs, swaps ferry gossip for hot stew.
personality: Male, late 20s; lively tenor with a river-lilt and breathy laughs; rollicking, superstitious, hates still water.

name: Sera Quickstep
background: Streetwise guide who sells safe routes after dark and the odd pilfered tip.
personality: Female, early 20s; bright, high-pitched soprano with rapid patter; clever, cheeky, loyal to good tippers.

name: Magistrate Elric Stone
background: Bridge-steps judge who settles disputes under the Charter’s carvings.
personality: Male, early 60s; dry bass with deliberate pauses and clipped enunciation; measured, tradition-bound, bribe-averse.

name: Sister Lysa Bell
background: Temple clerk who tallies tithe stones and blesses travelers at the arch.
personality: Female, late 20s; clear bell-like soprano, gentle cadence; precise, kind, firm about honesty.

name: Grell Pike
background: Dock bosun who assigns berths and keeps a coded log of tides and skippers.
personality: Male, mid-50s; rough dockside baritone, terse and no-nonsense; gruff, orderly, quick to laugh after work.

name: Anya Netsong
background: Fishmonger famed for knife-speed and a chorus voice at dawn auctions.
personality: Female, early 30s; musical mezzo-soprano with auction-chant rhythm; sunny, competitive, hates waste.

name: Darrekk Tarcap
background: Tar-and-rope chandler who patches hull seams for the price of a secret.
personality: Male, late 40s; nasal, tar-rasped mid-baritone with a slow drawl; close-mouthed, patient, stubborn as oak.

name: Captain Maud Bridgeward
background: Watch captain posted to the Keep, commands bell signals and patrol rosters.
personality: Female, early 40s; firm contralto with parade-ground clarity; stoic, fair, intolerant of laziness.

name: Olan Tallis
background: Keep scribe who logs toll counts and watch rotations in flawless script.
personality: Male, late 20s; thin, reedy tenor with quick, breathy starts; meticulous, anxious, proud of neat ledgers.

name: Prior Henric of the Hours
background: Temple prior who times the three daily chimes and tends a reliquary of river stones.
personality: Male, mid-50s; calm, resonant baritone with liturgical cadence; serene, curious, gently probing.

name: Rielle Sand
background: Footsore pilgrim on a vow-walk, trades stories for blessings.
personality: Female, early 20s; soft, airy soprano with breathy hesitations; gracious, wistful, stubborn about vows.

name: Tamsin Weaver
background: Guildmaster of the Weavers, arbitrates thread weights and banner commissions.
personality: Female, late 30s; authoritative mezzo with crisp diction and steady pace; commanding, diplomatic, counts everything twice.

name: Merrit Chandell
background: Candle guild factor who tracks wax debts and favors dim rooms for deals.
personality: Male, mid-30s; silky tenor kept low for conspiratorial tone; smooth, cautious, hates surprises.

name: Serjeant Wulfram
background: Gate serjeant who inspects wheel-marks and stamps caravan seals at first light.
personality: Male, early 40s; barked bass-baritone with gatehouse grit; brisk, suspicious, secretly loves dogs at the gate.

name: Berrit Ox
background: Cartwright’s son testing new axle pegs on outbound wagons.
personality: Male, 19; big-hearted tenor slightly high for his size; earnest, inventive, easily flustered.

name: Granny Willow
background: Warren midwife and fixer who trades bread for small kindnesses.
personality: Female, late 70s; creaky alto with a warm chuckle and village burr; wry, steel-spined, fiercely protective.

name: Pip Candlewick
background: Lantern-runner who strings lights through the alleys and sells safe escorts.
personality: Male, 18; boyish treble with quick, whispery delivery; nervy, nimble, ready to live up to the high expectations placed on him.

name: Kessa Threadbare
background: Seamstress-for-hire mending cloaks on stoops, hears every whispered plan.
personality: Female, early 30s; dry mezzo with needle-sharp consonants; witty, observant, generous with spare cloth.
